name: not_verifiable_post
description: checks the post and flags as credible
condition: post.veracity_unverified > 0.6 && post.veracity_stance_comment > 0.5 && post.veracity_stance_support > 0.3 && post.veracity_stance_support < 0.5 && post.veracity_stance_deny > 0.3 && post.veracity_stance_deny < 0.5 post.misinfome_credibility_confidence < 0.5
